title: Augmented Reality (AR)-Based Secondary School History/Geography Microlearning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of basic history/geography concepts and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Blended learning combining AR-based content with formative assessments in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Analyze the spatial-temporal context of historical events with over 80% accuracy using AR applications.
Visualize geographic information as a 3D augmented model and explain at least three terrain characteristics.
Perform decision-making processes at four or more levels in collaborative learning scenarios through AR simulation activities.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
